net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_CharSheet_Util_getClassArray
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
<html><pre>Returns a JSON object of class breakdown. The trick about it is the token might not already have this information, and if it doesn't, we have to infer some bits of it.

[
	{
		"class": "Fighter",
		"level": 4,
		"hitDie": 1d10
	},
	{
		"class": "Cleric",
		"level": 6,
		"hitDie": 1d8
	}
]
